text: @GavinNewsom Sorry where is your science now?? OPEN NOW !!!! The #WorldHealthOrganization made a complete U turn and said that #coronavirus patients doesn't need to be isolated or quarantined. No #SocialDistancing and it cannot even transmit from one patient to another. *See the video.* https://t.co/SHXpXbPaWK
